description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Download and start creating your own drum beats with this realistic drum machine. Features multiple drum kits with high quality samples, reverb, adjustable BPM, live input and more! (*Includes support for keyboard). Supports 1080P HD.
description.short: Download and start creating your own drum beats with this realistic drum machine. Features multiple drum kits with high quality samples, reverb, adjustable BPM, live input and more! (*Includes support for keyboard). Supports 1080P HD.
